item.title: The street and pavement outside the property are littered with rubbish and leaves, 20th September
item.description:
There is a noticeable build-up of litter (including paper, plastic, and other waste) along the roadside and pavement. Fallen leaves have also accumulated in the gutter, contributing to the mess. This not only affects the overall cleanliness of the area but may also block drains if left uncollected.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kellett Road, Brixton, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deliberate littering from flat above, 20th September
item.description:
Yet again the resident of a flat (believed to be no 11 Boxmoor House) is throwing items out of the window. He is also releasing water causing damage to flats below. It's a continuing problem. He must be ill and social services need to be involved.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Whiston Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
